Talk2000:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks to you, Link, our music reached
the esteemed ears of all the Great Fairies!

I'm sure they will provide you with
bountiful blessings.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>As for our ensemble, while we each bring
different notes to the melody, we all share
the same wish.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>We will keep playing our music for
travelers and locals alike!

If you ever find us performing somewhere,
Link, let us play for you! ♪All right?♪
Talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I know! Since you came all the way here,
I'll share a special secret.<sp:0:4:0>I've heard it said that the secret to a
Great Fairy's beauty is <clr:0000>monster parts<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Maybe they brew them into tinctures, or
maybe they grind them up for powder,
or maybe they even eat them.<sp:0:4:0>Who can fathom a Great Fairy's ways?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>But I do know that if you want to receive
a Great Fairy's <clr:0000>blessing<clr:ffff>, bring all shapes
and sizes of monster parts.<sp:0:4:0>You'll be glad you did!
Talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I know! Since you came all the way here,
I'll share a special secret.<sp:0:4:0>I've heard it said that the secret to a
Great Fairy's vitality is <clr:0000>precious ore<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Do they swallow them or rub them into
their skin? Do they gain power by wearing
them as jewelry?<sp:0:4:0>Who can fathom a Great Fairy's ways?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>But I do know that if you want to receive
a Great Fairy's <clr:0000>blessing<clr:ffff>, bring all shapes
and sizes of precious <clr:0000>ore<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>You'll be glad you did!
Talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Are you visiting the Great Fairies from
time to time?

There's Tera at Woodland Stable and, of
course, Kaysa at Outskirt Stable.<sp:0:4:0>Can't forget Mija at Snowfield Stable,
and last but not least, Cotera at Dueling
Peaks Stable.<sp:0:4:0>But whichever Great Fairy you visit, she's
sure to bestow her blessings on travelers!
Talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Oh my! You're quite underdressed.<sp:0:4:0>You might distract our audience, and we
do work so hard to entertain!
Talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Drip-drop in harmony with clip-clop!<sp:0:4:0>Today, even the rain is playing along with
the Stable Heroes!
Talk2008:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ah, Link! You're pretty much a regular
now, aren't you?
Talk0007: <sp:3:0:2:0b00>Whoops, I forgot to keep conducting!<sp:0:4:0>They'll be lost without me...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk2009:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy>You braved a thunderstorm for the sake
of our music? ♪So brave!♪

While our performance cannot lift the
clouds, it will lift your spirits!
Talk2010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Link! You've come to hear us play! You
must really love our music!
Talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Pitter-patter, flitter-flutter...<sp:0:4:0>The snow is softly accompanying the
Stable Heroes today!
Talk0010: <clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Oh? <sp:5:1:0>None of them were even watching me...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
